abilityEffect: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Gardevoir ex is your Active Pokémon, you may put an Imprison Marker on 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. Any Pokémon that has any Imprison markers on it can't use any Poké-Powers or Poké-Bodies. This power can't be used if Gardevoir ex is affected by a Special Condition.

effect.en: You may move a [R] Energy card attached to Gardevoir ex to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.
effect.fr: Vous pouvez déplacer une carte Énergie [R] attachée à Gardevoir ex sur 1 des Pokémon de votre Banc.
effect.de: Du kannst eine an Guardevoir ex angelegte [R]-Energiekarte an 1 Pokémon auf deiner Bank anlegen.
effect.it: Puoi spostare una carta Energia [R] assegnata a Gardevoir ex su 1 dei Pokémon nella tua Panchina.
effect.pt: Você pode mover 1 carta de Energia [R] ligada a Gardevoir ex a 1 dos seus Pokémon no Banco.
effect.es: Puedes mover una carta de Energía [R] unida a Gardevoir-ex a 1 de tus Pokémon en Banca.
